item.description:
Anyone who wants to learn how to swing dance ? now is a good time to try it ,lessons start at 6:30 and the band plays at 7:30 This is a very good band with brass.They will keep you dancing for hours Its an early evening for us working people : )


From Route 2 take exit 31 A , that will put on North Main, st. which is route 12 south, go about one mile on 12 South, and look for the Elks on your right , * everyone parks in the back.

$ 12 cover for lesson and a live band.

Rob is hosting...603 494 9405

Susan is a maybe, really. love to go ;)
item.how_to_find_us: look for rob...short, but really cute :)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Want to learn to Swing Dance?
